changeSet.author: Shawn
changeSet.comment: 增加经济系统模块的标签表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}economic_tag` ( `id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `tag_id` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '标签标识', `object_id` varchar(36) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '对象标识', `object_type` varchar(30) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '对象类型', `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否激活(0:否,1:是)', `created_by` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建用户', `updated_by` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后一次更新用户', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='经济模块-标签表';

changeSet.author: Shawn
changeSet.comment: 经济系统标签表增加object_id索引
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}economic_tag` ADD INDEX `idx_object_id`(`object_id`) USING BTREE COMMENT '对象标识唯一';
